title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives on a rainy city street, following a car and changing lanes.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and the pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safety in the rainy conditions. It follows the car in front and changes lanes to avoid potential obstacles. The driver is cautious and keeps a safe distance from other vehicles and pedestrians.
